activities.label:
True or False:
You can use the Instant Validiation and Online Validation buttons on the Home Screen to validate scratch off and draw game tickets or you can use the corresponding Validate Ticket functions on the Instant Functions and Online Functions buttons, they work the same to validate tickets.

invalid.label: Sorry,
invalid.text: the Validate Ticket option on the Instant Functions menu is the same as the Instant Validation button on the Home Screen and the Validate Ticket option on the Online Functions menu is the same as the Online Validation button.
